description:
Add and Subtract with Negative Numbers

Keep the party pumping in this fast n’ furious piñata smash-‘em-up! Move along the number line to intercept the descending piñatas, and then whack them for candy. Come on, catch the fever!

Helps with:
Addition
Subtraction
Number line
Negative numbers
name: Piñata Fever

description:
Basic Mental Math

Use your mental math skills to build the tallest, most incredible ice cream sundae possible

Helps with:
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division
name: Sundae Times Lite

description:
Angles, from basic rules to circle theorems

Help Itzi the spider climb the clock to rescue his family! Solve cunning angle puzzles to reveal a path through each level’s maze of tangled webs and reach the goal. It’s sure to make your head spin!

Helps with:
Basic angle rules
Parallel lines
Polygons
Circle theorems
name: A Tangled Web

description:
Factor simple and harder trinomials, including trinomials with common factors

S.O.S.! Ships navigating the treacherous Bermuda Rectangle are falling prey to bizarre disasters. Factor quadratic expressions to answer the ships’ distress calls and save their stricken crews!

Helps with:
Trinomials
Factorizing
Difference of two squares
Common factors
name: Wrecks Factor

description:
Times tables from ×2 up to ×15

Use your knowledge of times tables to build the tallest, most incredible ice cream sundae possible! Play against the computer or head-to-head versus other students from around the world.

Helps with:
Times tables
Number bonds
Multiplication facts
Mental math
name: Sundae Times

description:
Lengths, Perimeters and Areas of Shapes

Help, you've been mummified! Use your geometry skills to build a path and escape from the pyramid, staying ahead of the mongrel demon Ammit. Battle skull bats and skeleton thieves with your magical ankh cross.

Helps with:
Elementary School
Circles
Perimeters
Areas
name: Pyramid Panic Lite

description:
Prime Factorization with Multiplication and Division

Use multiplication and division with primes and prime factorization to defeat the alien invasions. Make use of divisibility strategies to achieve higher scores and progress to the next challenge.

Helps with:
Elementary School
Prime Factorization
Exponents
Multiplication
Division
name: Sigma Prime Lite

description:
P.E.M.D.A.S., The Order of Operations

Professor PEMDAS' roborators have run amok and need to destroyed.  Use your order-of-operations code-cracking abilities and powerful weaponry to close these robo-rebels down.

Helps with:
PEMDAS
Exponents
Roots
Times tables
name: Pemdas Blaster

description:
P.E.M.D.A.S., The Order of Operations

Apply your knowledge of the four operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) to crack the attacking Roborator's shield codes and then blast them into scrap metal!

Helps with:
Elementary School
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division
name: Pemdas Blaster Lite

description:
Ordering Decimals, Fractions & Percentages

Grow flowers and harvest them to make money in this addictive order-'em-up.  It may look simple but it's fractionally harder than you might imagine. Remember to wait for the bee!

Helps with:
Elementary School
Ordering
Decimals
Fractions
name: Flower Power Lite

description:
Linear Equations and Number Machines

Solve linear equations to guide atoms through the reactor. But don't keep the scientists waiting too long or they blow their tops! It's the ultimate nuclear test of your math skills!

Helps with:
Linear equations
Using number machines
One/multi-stage equations
name: Algebra Meltdown

description:
Prime Factorization with Multiplication and Division

Use multiplication and division with primes and prime factorization to defeat the alien invasions. Make use of divisibility strategies to achieve higher scores and progress to the next challenge.

Helps with:
Prime Factorization
Exponents
Multiplication
Division
name: Sigma Prime

description:
Fast Estimation with Basic Number Calculations

Help penguins migrate across a perilous ocean patrolled by hungry killer whales. Use your estimation and approximation skills to position floating icebergs and bounce the penguins safely from glacier to glacier.

Helps with:
Percentages
Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division
name: Ice Ice Maybe

description:
Basic Shapes to Advanced Geometry

Help, you've been mummified.  Use your geometry skills to build a path across the voids, and escape from the pyramid, staying ahead of the mongrel demon Ammit.  Battle skull bats and skeleton thieves with your ankh cross.

Helps with:
Trigonometry
Pythagoras
Areas
Perimeters
Circumference
name: Pyramid Panic

description:
Ordering Decimals, Fractions & Percentages

Grow flowers and harvest them to make money in this addictive order-'em-up.  It may look simple but it's fractionally harder than you might imagine. Remember to wait for the bee!

Helps with:
Ordering
Decimals
Fractions
Percentages
name: Flower Power

description:
Reflections, Rotations, Enlargements and Translations

Guide TranStar through the perilous voids of space in search of a new home. Call upon the power of exotic space transformation phenomena to reflect, rotate, translate and enlarge TranStar into the safety of the StarGate.

Helps with:
Reflections
Rotations
Enlargements
Translations
name: TranStar

description:
Linear, Quadratic and Cubic Equations

Defend Earth from deadly meteorites using the planetary missile defenses.  A team of dumb scientists are on hand to suggest possible trajectories and trash-talk.  Quickly plot your waypoints or find a new planet!

Helps with:
Linear eqns
Quadratic eqns
Cubic eqns
Coordinates
PEMDAS
name: Save Our Dumb Planet
